#Paso 1 - Conociendo los datos
```{r}
library(dplyr)

yearly = read.csv(file = "deaths_handwashing.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
yearly
```

#paso 2 - alarmante nÃºmero de muertes
```{r}
yearly = yearly %>%
  mutate(proportion_deaths = deaths/births)

yearly
```

#paso 3 - muerte en las clinicas
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(yearly, aes(x=proportion_deaths, y=year, color = clinic)) +
  geom_line()
```

#paso 4 - comienza el lavado de manos
```{r}
monthly = read.csv(file = "deaths_clinic_1.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
monthly = monthly %>%
  mutate(proportion_deaths = deaths/births)

head(monthly)
```


#paso 5 - El efecto del lavado de manos
```{r}
ggplot(head(monthly), aes(x=proportion_deaths,y=date)) +
  geom_line()

```
